gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all available project types in Jira so that I can choose the appropriate type for my new project.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all project types, including their keys and names, allowing me to understand the options available.

gold.user: As a team member, I need to see all project types that I have access to, so I can create or manage projects relevant to my role.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of project types that are accessible to the user, including necessary details to identify them.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to get detailed information about a specific project type using its key, so I can understand its configuration and capabilities.
gold.ideal: The API should return detailed information about the specified project type, including its name, description, and any associated settings.

gold.user: As a project administrator, I need to check if a specific project type is accessible to my team, so I can ensure they can create projects.
gold.ideal: The API should return a confirmation of accessibility for the specified project type, along with any relevant permissions or restrictions.
